analysis.description:
dPonzi.enter (/unique_chucks/32/0xd883209c4dcd497f24633c627a4e451013424841.sol#92-150) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- advisor.transfer(potCntInfo[i].entryAmount * multiplier) (/unique_chucks/32/0xd883209c4dcd497f24633c627a4e451013424841.sol#124-125)

dPonzi.sendFoods has external calls inside a loop:
	- p[k].transfer(food[k]) (/unique_chucks/32/0xd883209c4dcd497f24633c627a4e451013424841.sol#355-356)
